content.rendered:
The Thundercap Mountain Raid Den is on the mountain’s third floor (3F). This den can be accessed behind the giant stone tablet, which can be removed by solving the puzzle in this area.

If you need help solving the puzzle for this table then you can follow the tutorial here.

Location

Raid Pokémon

Pokémon Star Level
